chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 12 mini has the following problem:

I inserted a wrong cap in the order.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Ecomobile,

customer informs that he entered the zip code incorrectly.

Paolo Soroldoni
c/o Mitsubishi Electric
Via Energy Park 14
20871 Vimercate MB

Thanks for understanding.

Andreia, from Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner of the updated address.

Regards,
